awards.title: Harry Smith Prize
awards.summary: The Harry Smith Prize recognizes the best paper published by an early career researcher in Molecular Ecology

awards.title: Outstanding Teaching Assistant Award
awards.awarder: University of Toronto, Dept. Ecology and Evolutionary Biology
awards.summary: Awarded for excellence in teaching assistance in the Ecology and Evolutionary Biology department at University of Toronto

awards.title: Equity Initiative of the Year
awards.summary: Recognized for contributions to promoting equity within the McGill Science community

awards.title: Best Presentation Award
awards.awarder: Canadian Society for Ecology and Evolution
awards.summary: Awarded for my presentation at the joint Ecological Society of America and Canadian Society for Ecology and Evolution (ESA-CSEE) conference
